Text: Alguien me pude decir como se instala please? el instalador me da fatal error.

Many Thanks for this Danvart 

You,ve done some great uploads in the last couple of weeks greatly appreciated!

I installed the extension package and it stated it was installed sucessfully. I searched for it in my plug ins directory in Maya and it wasn't there. So, I searched and located it in my c drive. I found the file and loaded it in Maya, but nothing happened. It states that it could not find the files. So, does that mean I will have to copy the script files to maya itself and what files do I have to transfer over to get it to work.? If someone can list the files that would need to be transfered I would greatly appreciate it. Thanks.
